alert.note: Alert for Sullivan; Vigo (Indiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 5:01AM EDT by NWS Indianapolis
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Vigo and northern Sullivan Counties through 530 AM EDT... At 501 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Paris to 7 miles northwest of Sullivan. Movement was east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. These storms will remain over mainly rural areas of Vigo and northern Sullivan Counties, including the following locations... Fontanet, West Terre Haute, Hymera, Shepardsville, Fairbanks, Prairieton, Seelyville, Shelburn, Farmersburg and Pimento. This includes Interstate 70 between mile markers 1 and 16. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
